notes.text: You can now specify the sideEffectsEventsInteractionType value in a list report used in an adaptation project
You can now specify the additionalSemanticObject value in an object page used in an adaptation project
We now correctly translate the header form label of an object page and the data fields in field groups of line items
We now ensure that stashed controls in the header of the object page no longer trigger data request
You can now use the value Auto for the initialLoad setting in list report for UI adaptation projects
